data.name: AppName
data.comment: App name shows as the title of the application.

data.name: SavePartition
data.comment: Tab title of feature saving a partition to the disk.

data.name: WritePartition
data.comment: Table title of feature write an image file to a partition.

data.name: LabelPartition
data.comment: A lable, identifying the combo box below is for select partition.

data.name: ReloadPartition
data.comment: A button to refresh partition table.

data.name: SaveButton
data.comment: A button to save partition to a file.

data.name: WriteButton
data.comment: A button to write a file content to a partition.

data.name: ErrorNoPartition
data.value: No partition found on your device, try re-run this app with "sudo".
data.comment: A error message to tell user no partition found on device, and suggest to run with sudo.

data.name: LabelFileToSave
data.comment: A lable, identifying the textbox below is for select file to save.

data.name: LabelFileToFlash
data.comment: A lable, identifying the textbox below is for select file to read and write content to Partition.

data.name: LabelFormat
data.comment: A lable, identifying the radiobuttons below is for select format image to save.

data.name: BrowseButton
data.comment: A button to browse file on the disk.

data.name: FileTypeNameDiskImages
data.comment: File type name of disk images.

data.name: ConfirmFlashText
data.value: Are you sure to flash to a {0} partition {1}?
data.comment: A confirmation text to show before flash action. {0} is the size of the partition, and {1} is the partition name.
